name: Augurers' Quarter
role_in_state: Licensed navigational-augury and ritual service hub
economy_niches: import and sale of ritual reagents
small-scale ritual-fittings for ships (figureheads, warding charms)
culture_adjustments: guild-dominated practice: augurers apprenticed and licensed
higher multilingualism from constant merchant traffic
practical ritualism stricter about waste and public safety
oral navigational lore institutionalized into paid services
constraints: depends on scarce imported reagents; supply chokepoints critical
augury practices tightly regulated by guilds and state
no long-range mind-influence or instant-resurrection magics permitted
notes: dense urban quarter adjacent to main harbor; limited expansion room
licensed augurers are crucial for safe maritime commerce
significant informal market for contested augury techniques
